original_title: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise (Proudly Made in India) (3 BLACK PAIR)
optimized_title: KAKSS Vinyl Coated Dumbbells Set, Hex Cast Iron Neoprene Dumbbells 0.5kg 1kg 3kg 5kg Pairs, Colour Coded Non-Slip Gym Weights Set for Home Gym Equipment and Fitness Training for women and men

image_analysis.product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise (3 BLACK PAIR)
image_analysis.quantity: various pairs; infographic shows 3 pairs (6 dumbbells)
image_analysis.material: vinyl coated, cast-iron core; neoprene or similar non-slip coating
key_features: Color Coded Thick Vinyl Coating For Comfortable And Non-Slip Feel
Hexagon Shaped Edges For Easy Storage And Prevent Rolling
image_analysis.usage: Strength training and fitness exercises at home or in the gym
image_analysis.target_audience: People doing home workouts or gym exercise who want coated dumbbells in various weights
image_analysis.ai_description: Compact hex-shaped KAKSS dumbbells with smooth, color-coded coating in pink, red, blue and green. Each end is clearly printed with the brand and weight in kilograms. The vinyl or neoprene-style finish gives a matte, non-slip look suited to home or gym use.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Thick vinyl coating gives a secure, non-slip grip even with sweaty hands.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap dumbbells use thin, slick paint that chips and feels slippery.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Hex cast-iron heads stop the dumbbells rolling and protect floors.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Round or poorly shaped weights roll away and can damage surfaces.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Professional grade cast-iron core keeps weight balanced rep after rep.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Low-cost sets have uneven filling, so each side feels a different weight.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Colour-coded pairs and clear kg markings make grabbing the right weight easy.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Budget options fade or lack clear labels, causing confusion mid-workout.
